title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 450 of 2020)) and in exercise of the powers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited education (delegation ministerial functions) order 2022

title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 450 of 2020)) and in exercise of the powers
heading: 2. The powers and duties of the Minister for Education conferred on her
text_raw:
2. The powers and duties of the Minister for Education conferred on her 
by or under the provisions of the enactments specified in the Schedule are 
delegated to Josepha Madigan, Minister of State at the Department of 
Education.
text_norm: 2 power duty minister education conferred provision enactment specified schedule delegated josepha madigan minister state department education

title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 450 of 2020)) and in exercise of the powers
heading: 3. The Education (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2021 (S.I.
text_raw:
3. The Education (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2021 (S.I. 

No. 222 of 2021) is revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [399] 3
text_norm: 3 education (delegation ministerial functions) order 2021 (s.i no 222 2021) revoked notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 29th july 2022 399 3

title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 450 of 2020)) and in exercise of the powers
heading: Paragraph (a) of section 7(1) of the Education Act 1998, in so far as that
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Paragraph (a) of section 7(1) of the Education Act 1998, in so far as that 
paragraph relates to persons with a disability or other special educational needs 
(both within the meaning of section 2(1) of that Act) 

Subsections (3) and (4) of section 7 of the Education Act 1998, in so far as 
those subsections relate to the performance of the other functions under that 
Act delegated by this order 

Section 33(i) and (j)(iv) of the Education Act 1998, in so far as those 
provisions relate to persons with a disability or other special educational needs 
(both within the meaning of section 2(1) of that Act) 

Section 37A (as substituted by section 6 of the Education (Provision in Respect 
of Children with Special Educational Needs) Act 2022 (No. 22 of 2022)) of the 
Education Act 1998 

Sections 21, 22 and 28 of, and Schedule 1 to, the Education for Persons with 
Special Educational Needs Act 2004 (No. 30 of 2004) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [399] 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

27 July, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [399] 5 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
